scripts.dev:extension: pnpm run build:packages:extension && concurrently -n "types,core,adapters,shared-state,ui,extension" -c "blue,cyan,green,magenta,yellow,red" "pnpm --filter @dbview/types watch" "pnpm --filter @dbview/core watch" "pnpm --filter @dbview/adapters watch" "pnpm --filter @dbview/shared-state watch" "pnpm --filter @dbview/ui dev" "pnpm --filter @dbview/vscode-extension watch"

scripts.build:packages:extension: pnpm run build:types && pnpm run build:core && pnpm run build:adapters && pnpm run build:shared-state
